oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Foreign paper, manufactured in Bombay by Abdoola Saheb Abdool Rehman Hurufullah, watermark : "River Jumna".
Pamphlet binding, single section sewn through fold; hardboard covers lined with pink striped cloth.
Written in black ink with red headings and verse numbers, 14-15 lines per page. Text contained in pages with ruled lines and borders.
Ms. generally in good condition, edges of paper water-stained and frayed, manuscript appears to have been rebound; several folios missing.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
